samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example demonstrates a simple, mobile-friendly and responsive JavaScript DateRangePicker to select a range of dates (startDate and endDate)

samples.name: Day Span
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to restrict the users to select the minimum and maximum number of days (minspan and maxspan) between the selected range of start and end dates

samples.name: Date Range
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to disables the specific range of dates (min and max) in a Vue DateRangePicker

samples.name: Format
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to change the date time format in the input field based on the format in a Vue DateRangePicker

samples.name: Presets
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to specify the predefined custom date ranges (presets range) like last month, last year and current week in the dropdown popup

samples.name: Month Range Picker
samples.description: The Vue DateRangePicker component can act as a month and year picker. It helps you to select a month or year quickly with all months related properties.
